creator: a.freije@minihouse.com
text:
The block-container property "position" does not exist. It must be renamed to
"absolute-position"
BTW, why does the documentation say that the block-container is unsupported?

creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
text:
"position" is a shorthand property that sets "relative-position" and "absolute-
position".
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
